general.description:
Frontend web developer specialized in JS development and Design System implementation. Strong interest in design.
Graduated in 2022 with a Master's degree in Software Engineering from the Faculty of Sciences in Montpellier.

formations: Baccalaureate in Life Sciences and Computer Science (2017)

experiences.contribution: Set up a frontend web application for a client demonstration. Tools: React, MUI JOY, React Query, i18n
Assisted the client in setting up Storybook and the component library + developed initial components. Tools: Angular, Angular Material, Storybook
Web application for technical monitoring at frog. Established a team and SCRUM methodology, frontend development, design of mockups. Tools: Jira, Figma. Tech: React, Storybook

experiences.context: Website for vehicle rentals and purchases.
experiences.contribution: Developed pages and web components for an external integrator. Tech: Lit (web components), Storybook

experiences.context: Showcase website template for Garnier brand products.
experiences.contribution: Frontend contribution and bug resolution. Tech: VueJS, Tailwind

experiences.context: Automatic conversion of design tokens from Figma to a GitHub repository.
experiences.contribution: Development of the POC, automatic changelog, package. Tools: Style Dictionary, GitHub
Understanding the requirement and proposing a solution, development of a tool in 1 week, testing, design. Tech: REACT, ElectronJs, Storybook

experiences.context: Contribution to the Popcorn time tracking application
experiences.contribution: Refactoring, front-end architecture correction, implementation of a storybook, bug fixes. Tech: React, Storybook

experiences.context: Application to reference the skills and preferences of frog employees.
experiences.contribution: Implementation of tech tools, design, front-end development, testing, documentation. Tech: React, Apollo (GraphQL), Tailwind, Storybook
